Services

Sakura Holding takes a comprehensive approach.

Social E-Commerce

Creates market place for sellers and buyers, with messaging as First-class citizen.

Responsive design

Designs that are responsive for all mediums.

Scalable solution

Deployed the solution in a horizontally scalable fashion using Docker and Kubernetes orchestration.

Automated Tests

Writing 4 level of automated tests, Unit Testing, Integration Testing, System Testing and Acceptance Testing.

Security

Ensure security from all perspectives, including DNS, Authentication and Authorization.

Intellectual property

Securing ownerships by writing patents.

Chatify

Social E-commerce

Chatify is a marketplace for local Japanese products. You can find authentic products selling by local family-run businesses, and negotiate with them directly.

  • Link: site
  • Category: E-Commerce

ShootShot

Instant Simultaneous Messaging

Developed the first and the only Instant Simultaneous Messaging platform. ShootShot is a mobile app designed to build a "Mutual Trust" by asking personal questions and self-disclosing mutually. Use this app to take your relationship and friendship to the next level with your family and friends. This app has been designed and developed based on a patented algorithm.

  • Link: site
  • Category: Communication

Inify

Influencer Marketing platform.

Inify is an influencer marketing platform to boost your campaigns in Instagram. Offering tools for brands and agencies to negotiate with potential influencers, using clever algorithm.

  • Category: Marketing

Mystery Box

Lucky Japanese Products.

Mystery box is an online market place to order mystery boxes from Japan. You can personalise your mystery box according to your liking and surprise your loved ones as well as yourself.

  • Category: Graphic Design

ResQue

Queueing as a Service.

ResQue app is a two-sided platform designed to find a "Queuer" to stand in the line of events on behalf of you. You can also become a "Queuer" and earn money by queuing.

  • Category: Services
